DAMNNATIONNNNN
GOD DAMNNNNNNN

Howdy fellas :)
This is my third usersight in the mix that features a minimalist-esque touch with some lines and shapes. The sight features a ranging triangle and circle that adjusts like the regular sight would whenever you rangefind (seen in image 4 and 6)

I did this so I wouldn't be confused as most modern sights don't have the movable lines that tell you how far your sight elevates.

I also added the sight preset that I use (image 2) on the zip file. Make sure that file goes exactly to tank_sight_presets in the Usersights folder....
